summary: Diff implements broad Arabic text localization in key UI components/pages, adds RTL document configuration (lang/dir) and basic RTL CSS adjustments, and localizes month names on Dashboard/Billing. It also includes unrelated styling/config changes (Tailwind/design tokens) and other non-localization refactors not explicitly requested.

evidence: frontend/src/index.css (large changes to CSS variables for light/dark themes in addition to RTL rules)
